dcterms:description: An open urban driving simulator used for generating driving datasets, allowing for the collection of video frames and affordances in various driving scenarios.

dcterms:description: A model that learns to predict multiple affordances in urban driving environments, utilizing video data for training.
dcterms:title: Conditional Affordance Learning (CAL) model

dcterms:description: A dataset focused on selecting informative video frames from autonomous vehicle videos using multi-criteria selection methods.
dcterms:title: Multi-criteria online frame-subset selection for autonomous vehicle videos
